product_name: Just Tomatoes, Etc.! Just Fruit Munchies Mix - 3 oz.
long_description: The Just Tomatoes, Etc.! Just Fruit Munchies mix combines freeze-dried apples, grapes, blueberries, sour cherries, mangos, pineapple and raspberries for a tasty snack you can enjoy anywhere.
short_description: The Just Tomatoes, Etc.! Just Fruit Munchies mix combines freeze-dried apples, grapes, blueberries, sour cherries, mangos, pineapple and raspberries for a tasty snack you can enjoy anywhere.
